summary: Replaces female underwear with a chainmail texture version.
descriptionHtml:
Replaces female underwear with a chainmail texture version.

Drop the Data folder in your \"skyrim\" directory or, alternatively, drop the textures in your \"skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\" directory.

These textures will replace the underwear texture for ALL females.

To uninstall, just delete the textures from your \"skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\" directory.

[center][b][color=Darkorange]Featured in MMOxReview\'s Skyrim Mods Weekly #1[/color]
(even though he calls it pervy and credits the wrong person - geez)[/b]
[youtube]6EN8oeXFZWs[/youtube][/center]
author: Rekicker
